rows.label: qst102503_msg0003
rows.name:
I thought if I could just reach the
Hræsvelgr village... but I suppose
I shouldn't push myself too hard.

rows.label: qst102503_msg0004
rows.name:
Pilolo was looking for
me...? What, you're with
the mercenary corps too?!

rows.label: qst102503_msg0005
rows.name:
Since you've already helped me, would
you be willing to take on a job?

rows.label: qst102503_msg0007
rows.name:
For that purpose, I want to
obtain the Dragon Incense
from the Dragon's Stomach.

rows.label: qst102503_msg0008
rows.name:
With Dragon Incense, you can
tame a Divine Beast, you see.

rows.label: qst102503_msg0009
rows.name:
The last time I came, I was
able to enter the stomach
without any trouble...

rows.label: qst102503_msg0010
rows.name:
But for some reason, the path
to the stomach is now blocked,
and I can't get in.

rows.label: qst102503_msg0011
rows.name:
I would like you to find a way to
get into the Dragon's Stomach.

rows.label: qst102503_msg0012
rows.name:
I will wait at the Hræsvelgr village,
if that's alright with you.

rows.label: qst102503_msg0013
rows.name:
It will be a difficult request,
but I'm counting on you.
